A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I will start by saying after reading and listening to several spoiler reviews I didnt think I would enjoy this movie. But those reviews made seeing the movie feel almost like seeing it for a second time instead of a first and I have to say I loved this movie. The risk that it took were well thought out but had a decent payoff in the end. I have to add that I am a casual and not a hardcore fan of Star Wars so while I enjoyed this movie a lot I can understand where some more hardcore fans may or may not enjoy it as much. But in my opinion this was a very solid movie not just feeling like a Star Wars movie but a overall great told story and film.
